EmailMessages.Subject: Welcome to our newsletter
EmailMessages.Body:
Dear {FirstName},

Thank you for subscribing to our newsletter. We will send you regular updates on our latest products and promotions.

Best regards,

The Marketing Team

EmailMessages.Subject: Exclusive offer for VIP members
EmailMessages.Body:
Dear {FirstName},

As a valued VIP member, we would like to offer you an exclusive discount on our latest product line. This offer is only available to VIP members like you, so act now and save!

Best regards,

The Marketing Team
